#Points to drive home on teen mental health

&nbsp;

.Large[
Eivind Hansen, director of Haukeland University Hospital<br /> <br /> Provide information to youth that:
- clearly characterises symptoms of mental health disorders
- encourges youth to be open and seek help early
- breaks the stigma of anxiety, compulsive behavior and depression
- teaches youth to support others in need 

We can *always* be better!]

---
class: top, left

#Points to drive home on prevention 

&nbsp;

.Large[
Jan Tore Sanner, Minister of Education and Integration <br /> <br /> Provide a healthy educational environment to:
- promote confidence, successful learning, coping skills for life 
- eliminate mobbing
- avoid undo stress at school
- support school mental health care


*Everyone* can do something to promote positive mental health.]
